data.title: Valencia College
data.text:
Valencia College Downtown Campus provides students an opportunity to live and learn in downtown Orlando. Our only location to offer on-campus housing, this campus is a great fit for students who want to study in a centrally-located setting, and have a variety of options for activities on nights and weekends.

500 W Livingston St

Orlando, FL 32801

407-299-5000

Virtual Tour

Facebook

East meets art at the campus that is home to our School of Arts and Entertainment. This creative atmosphere encourages a sketch or two from the banks of the Little Econlockhatchee River. Only a few minutes from UCF, it's convenient for students taking general education classes and earning an A.A. degree. Stop by and we’ll even teach you to pronounce Econlockhatchee.

701 N Econlockhatchee Trl

Orlando, FL 32825

407-299-5000

Interactive Map

Virtual Tour

Facebook

Lake Nona’s close ties to Medical City puts the focus on future careers in medicine and biotechnology. Through a partnership with Lake Nona High, high school students can earn a Valencia College degree while they’re simultaneously getting their diploma. It’s like a distant educational utopia, only it’s actually happening right now.

12350 Narcoossee Rd

Orlando, FL 32832

407-582-7100

Interactive Map

Virtual Tour

Facebook

Osceola is equipped with the latest training technologies and labs for biology, chemistry and physics. It also has the college's largest library of all the campuses and a huge green screen to create your own custom video presentations. Plus, with UCF bachelor's programs offered on site, you can start and keep on studying here.

1800 Denn John Ln

Kissimmee, FL 34744

407-299-5000

407-994-4191 – Local in Osceola County

Interactive Map

Virtual Tour

Facebook

Our Poinciana Campus houses a robust selection of classrooms, amenities, labs and a state-of-the-art culinary kitchen—providing Poinciana residents with access to all the college has to offer. And with Accelerated Skills Training programs, you can train for a higher-wage career in just weeks.

3255 Pleasant Hill Rd

Kissimmee, FL 34746

407-299-5000

Interactive Map

Virtual Tour

Facebook

Valencia College’s School of Public Safety provides comprehensive education, training and resources for our communities’ first responders—helping Central Florida maintain the finest in public safety services to protect its booming visitor and residential populations.

8600 Valencia College Ln

Orlando, FL 32825

407-582-8200

Interactive Map

Virtual Tour

Facebook

West is best for high-tech programs like engineering, architecture, math and health sciences. And did we mention the mind-blowing technology inside some of the newest LEED certified green buildings? You won’t want to leave. And since we offer UCF degree programs on campus, you won’t have to.

1800 S Kirkman Rd

Orlando, FL 32811

407-299-5000

Interactive Map

Virtual Tour

Facebook

Winter Park is a central, convenient, tucked-away powerhouse of learning nestled into one of the most picturesque cities in America. This campus is home to the Jeffersonian Honors Program, which is focused on producing active, global citizens.

850 W Morse Blvd

Winter Park, FL 32789

407-299-5000

Interactive Map

Virtual Tour

Facebook

Valencia College offers its Advanced Manufacturing programs, serving both Orange and Osceola counties. Our programs help you further your skills, gain experience using the newest tools in the field and earn nationally recognized certifications.

1099 Cross Prairie Pkwy

Kissimmee, FL 34744

407-582-8277

Virtual Tour

Facebook

Generously supported by Heart of Florida United Way

Our downtown location offers a place to further your skills, gain experience using the newest tools in the field and earn nationally-recognized certifications.

400 Pittman St, suite 102

Orlando, FL 32801

407-582-6688

407-582-3587

Interactive Map

Virtual Tour

Facebook

Valencia College Heart of Florida United Way Center for Accelerated Training located in Northwest Orlando, is our largest yet with 26,000 square feet of space. At this centralized location, you can expand your current skills and gain experience using the newest tools and technologies in the field while earning nationally recognized certifications in growing industries from construction, manufacturing and health care, to IT and transportation logistics.

3437 W.D. Judge Dr

Orlando, FL 32808

407-582-6688

Interactive Map

Virtual Tour

Instructors take their real-world experience and teach the newest industry techniques—giving you knowledge that prepares you for a rewarding career. Learn the skills that employers are looking for at our Poinciana Campus location.

3255 Pleasant Hill Rd

Kissimmee, FL 34746

407-582-6688

Interactive Map

Facebook

Valencia College’s School of Public Safety Fire Rescue Training Facility offers a wide variety of training and learning opportunities for our community’s public and private sector fire service professionals. Our programs focus on the most recent updates, topics and equipment and are taught by experienced professionals from the field. In addition, Valencia College can customize programs to meet the specific needs of any agency.

2966 W Oak Ridge Rd

Orlando, FL 32809

407-582-8156

Interactive Map
